function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Monitoring the movement of passengers from the worst-hit city of Wuhan","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 to other locations","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel restrictions and quarantine measures for individuals coming from affected areas","Technologies":"Big data analytics, AI, digital tracking","People":"Passengers, travelers, local residents","Owner":"Government authorities, health organizations"},{"Description":"Creation of a smartphone app giving color codes to citizens based on contagion risk","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy and discrimination based on color codes","Mitigation":"Ensure transparency and privacy protection in the app, and provide clear guidelines on the use of color codes","Technologies":"Smartphone app, big data analytics, digital tracking","People":"Citizens, government authorities","Owner":"Government authorities, technology companies"},{"Description":"Deployment of AI-based temperature scanners in railway stations and subways","Impact":"False positive or false negative results leading to potential spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and testing of the temperature scanners, and verification through additional screening methods","Technologies":"AI, temperature scanners, facial detection","People":"Railway and subway passengers, staff","Owner":"Transport authorities, technology companies"}]}
